1.guardian_desc: Supporting barrages periodically appear during battle.
1.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Power $1/10 times.

2.guardian_desc: At the beginning of battle, all enemies are inflicted with a special Burn ailment.
2.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Power $1/30 times.

3.guardian_desc: Increases your fleet's DMG dealt by 15.0%, but causes them to lose 0.5% of their max HP every 5s.
3.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Power $1/70 times.

4.guardian_desc: Summons a steel dragon to join the battle.
4.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Power $1/120 times.

5.guardian_desc: Increases your fleet's SPD by 10.0% and LCK by 66.
5.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Harvest $1/10 times.

6.guardian_desc: During battle, your ships recover 1.0% of their max HP every 10s.
6.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Harvest $1/30 times.
6.guardian_name: Goddess of Desserts and Tea Parties

7.guardian_desc: Your flagship takes 40.0% less DMG, but will tank 20.0% of the DMG dealt to other allies.
7.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Harvest $1/70 times.

8.guardian_desc: Changes the Armor type of all your ships to Heavy.
8.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Harvest $1/120 times.

9.guardian_desc: Every 20s, increases the DMG dealt by a random ship in your fleet by 30.0% for 8s.
9.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Wisdom $1/10 times.

10.guardian_desc: Increases your fleet's DMG dealt by 15.0% for the first 60s after the start of battle; afterward, decreases their DMG dealt by 10.0%.
10.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Wisdom $1/30 times.

11.guardian_desc: Changes the movement algorithm of your fleet during Auto Combat.
11.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Wisdom $1/70 times.

12.guardian_desc: Increases your fleet's stats depending on how many different factions are represented.
12.guardian_gain_desc: Pray to the Statue of Wisdom $1/120 times.

13.guardian_desc: When the Boss appears, fires a supporting barrage that deals damage equal to 30.0% of its max HP.

14.guardian_desc: When your fleet fires a Main Gun salvo, launches an airstrike, or fires torpedoes, increases the whole fleet's DMG dealt by 2.0%/2.0%/1.0%, respectively.

15.guardian_desc: When the battle starts, summons a loyal and brave ally to fight for your fleet.
